name: Flavouride
description:
Description:
Help the little bee to discover all foods flavours.

Explore the levels, master the movement and taste all the ingredients on the Flavour Island.

UPDATE #3

  • Cancel flying by pressing DOWN.
  • More illustrative controls skits.
  • Minor graphics changes.

UPDATE #2

  • Added in-game pause menu.
  • Minor graphics changes.
  • Minor fix.

UPDATE #1

  • Added X for jump.
  • Fixed controls room outside map.
  • Minor graphics changes.
  • Extended reaction time from ground to start chained jump.

Note:

Entry made for Pixel Day 2021.
And remaining in the topic, I tried a very low resolution of 200 x 150.

I'm experiencing a choppy framerate on Firefox despite all the optimizations, if the same happens to you try on Chrome / Opera.
